metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4657 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The safe_eval function in Ansible before 1.5.4 does not properly restrict the code subset, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted instructions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4657` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 1.6.5+dfsg-1
ansible-fireball - 1.6.5+dfsg-1
ansible-node-fireball - 1.6.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.5+dfsg-1').
